mapper.update: update account set tradePassword = #{tradepassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usableAmount = #{usableamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, freezedAmount = #{freezedamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, borrowLimitAmount = #{borrowlimitamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, version = version + 1, unReceiveInterest = #{unreceiveinterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unReceivePrincipal = #{unreceiveprincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unReturnAmount = #{unreturnamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remainBorrowLimit = #{remainborrowlimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND version = #{version}
mapper.select: select id, tradePassword, usableAmount, freezedAmount, borrowLimitAmount, version, unReceiveInterest, unReceivePrincipal, unReturnAmount, remainBorrowLimit from account where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, tradePassword, usableAmount, freezedAmount, borrowLimitAmount, version, unReceiveInterest, unReceivePrincipal, unReturnAmount, remainBorrowLimit from account
